Name: The Explorer of Night
About the game: The explorer of night is an minimalist platformer, where you need to help the main character to get out of the forest, inhabited by unfriendly enemies and dangerous traps. In the game you will find interesting puzzles, boss fights and cute story Beat the challenging levels Defend yourself from a variety of enemies Enjoy the pleasant gaming atmosphere
